features: Durable ripstop, poly and Bi-Tech Armor Lite™ materials cover high wear areas for maximum abrasion resistance so you don’t have to worry about that careless baggage handler at the airport
Ultra-durable, multi-directional wheels stored in a heavy-duty wheel housing keep you rolling along anywhere your life takes you
Expansion zipper allows you to add that extra article of clothing you know your loved one forgot for the trip, without overloading your bag
Lockable zippers with a Central Lock Point and Secure Zip™ Toggles will keep your bag protected from intruders and give you peace of mind
External lash points for gear attachment or the ability to secure your bag to a roof top can be crucial for situations when your bag needs to be as versatile as you are
The fabric blocking material covers scuffs and stains and helps your bag maintain a fresh look, even after years of travel
Interior compression straps and pockets offer the perfect way to organize your bag and make the most of the packing space
Mesh ID pocket allows for a quick stash of your contact info in case things go wrong
A vertical quick stash pocket helps keep important items within reach
With the No Matter What™ Warranty, you’ll know your investment is secure and your research was well worth it
